definitions.definition: A line placed underneath a piece of text in order to provide emphasis or to indicate that it should be viewed in italics or (in electronic documents) that it acts as a hyperlink .
An announcement of a theatrical performance to follow, placed in an advertisement for the current one.
A caption beneath a photograph (which may have more than one line of text).

main_definition: A line placed underneath a piece of text in order to provide emphasis or to indicate that it should be viewed in italics or (in electronic documents) that it acts as a hyperlink .
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) An announcement of a theatrical performance to follow, placed in an advertisement for the current one.
( dated ) A caption beneath a photograph (which may have more than one line of text).
